page.title: 16Playground Games, Stickney.
page.content: Playground games have got more modern over the years.The main game is football.There are eleven players in a football team.There is a goalie.He is a person who saves the ball from getting past him using his hands and feet.The defenders are people that just use their feet to kick the ball away from the goal.The rest of the players pass the ball to each other and try to get the ball past the other players to score a goal. A game we play is called Fox and Hounds.You need a base, and five people to be hounds . The people who are hounds have to catch the foxes.If they do they have to count to ten. After that if the fox has not got away he's a hound and the person who caught him becomes a fox and the game goes on.
